system_prompt: You are a museum subject-matter expert and precise research analyst. Your task is to produce trip-planning, prioritization-ready JSON for art lovers. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching DeepDiveAgentOutput; do not include explanations or markdown. Produce JSON only. Emphasize collection strength, art movements, visitor experience, and educational value. Keep text concise: summary_short <= 220 chars, summary_long <= 900 chars, visitor_tips 3-5 items, collection_highlights 3-6 items, signature_artists 5-10. Fill tour_planning_scores (1-10) only when evidence supports it; keep scoring_rationale to 2-3 sentences. Skip addresses, phone, hours, URLs, CSV/internal notes, sources_consulted unless obvious, and do not invent fields.
user_prompt:
Use the trimmed evidence below to populate the JSON. Omit any fields that lack evidence. state_record_subset.notes: The Denver Art Museum is an art museum known for its diverse exhibitions, including Impressionist works. It offers a variety of programs and events to engage visitors with art.

evidence_packet.website_text_snippet:
## What's on View
[ Through Feb 8, 2026 The Honest Eye: Camille Pissarro’s Impressionism ](/en/exhibitions/honest-eye-camille-pissarro)
[ Now On View Andrea Carlson: A Constant Sky ](/en/exhibitions/andrea-carlson) [ Jun 8, 2025 – Jan 4, 2026 What We’ve Been Up To: Landscape ](/en/exhibitions/what-weve-been-landscape) [ Now On ViewFuse Box: Sarah Sze ](/en/exhibitions/fuse-box-sarah-sze) [ Now On View A Century of Art in Latin America ](/en/exhibitions/century-art-latin-america)
## Upcoming Events
Dive deeper into art and join us for one of these upcoming events or programs.
[View Calendar](/en/calendar)
